attributes.action: Create a Devolved Parliament for England to put it on a level footing with the rest of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should the rest of the UK have the burden of a devolved goverment answering to what is a proportionately an English parliament?
Giving England its' own parliament would create the oppertunity for Westminster to become a federal seat and concentrate on matters relating to the UK instead of having the additional burden of local English matters, the like of  which have been passed on to the Scottish, Welsh and Northern Irish Parlaiments.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
